metadata.title: CVE-2023-20938 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description:
In binder_transaction_buffer_release of binder.c, there is a possible useafter free due to improper input validation. This could lead to localescalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed.User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions:Android kernelAndroid ID: A-257685302References: Upstream kernel

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-20938` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.19.0-21-generic - 5.19.0-21.21
linux-image-5.19.0-21-generic-lpae - 5.19.0-21.21
linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-21-generic - 5.19.0-21.21
linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-21-generic-64k - 5.19.0-21.21
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-1008-kvm - 5.19.0-1008.8
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-1009-aws - 5.19.0-1009.9
No subscription required

No subscription required

No subscription required

No subscription required

No subscription required

linux-image-5.19.0-1004-raspi - 5.19.0-1004.10
linux-image-5.19.0-1004-raspi-nolpae - 5.19.0-1004.10
No subscription required
